abstract: GoDaddy, which has been producing its own commercials and other ads for more than seven years, is hiring a professional advertising agency to create campaigns as the company seeks a more professional image.
snippet: GoDaddy, which has been producing its own commercials and other ads for more than seven years, is hiring a professional advertising agency to create campaigns as the company seeks a more professional image.
lead_paragraph: 6:03 p.m. | Updated GoDaddy, a brand notorious for suggestive Super Bowl commercials with scantily clad women known as GoDaddy Girls, is hiring a professional advertising agency to create campaigns as the company seeks a more professional image.

headline.main: A ‘Grown Up’ GoDaddy Hires an Ad Agency
